Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The second sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete), showing Mao Zedong meeting with Hồ Chí Minh (胡志明). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The Mao quote reads "The patriotic and just struggle of the South Vietnamese people against the U.S.-Ngô Đình Diệm [Wu Tingyan, 吴庭艳] clique has won numerous victories, both politically and militarily. We Chinese people resolutely support the just struggle of the people in Southern Vietnam."
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
